```{r}
library(rvest)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
all_sentences = read.csv("datasets/all_sentences.csv")
crowdsourced = read.csv("datasets/crowdsourced.csv")
groundtruth = read.csv("datasets/groundtruth.csv")
```

```{r}
rom_ob_all = all_sentences %>% 
  filter(File_id == "2012-10-03.txt")

rom_ob_crowd = crowdsourced %>% 
  filter(File_id == "2012-10-03.txt")

rom_ob_truth = crowdsourced %>% 
  filter(File_id == "2012-10-03.txt")

```
